item.description:
## Current Release Notes * Tweak mod sorting undo\redo * Attempt not to crash if drive where mods are stored no longer exists * Fix small issue while waiting for steam to boot up
## Release Notes 1.22 * Update dependencies * Improve detection whether steam is running or not (for steam games) * Add paradox launcher running warning * Button to test configured external diff tool added * Add placeholder logic to let Irony know to ignore certain types (for mod devs) * Change default path for dialogs * Add mod id info to mod collection export metadata * Add definition last modified date info in conflict solver (in tooltips) * Add mod search\filtering OR operator support for certain fields * Exclude non event related namespaces from definition code extraction * Show missing mods notification if mod is deinstalled and is in a collection * Auto detect gog games on windows * Detect and treat as error files without BOM encoding * Mod sorting undo\redo added

## Current Release Notes * Tweak mod sorting undo\redo * Attempt not to crash if drive where mods are stored no longer exists * Fix small issue while waiting for steam to boot up
